oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How to assist your beef clients with bull buying decisions using herd goals and Expected Progeny Differences (EPDs)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hilton, W. Mark
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: genetics
expected progeny differences
genomically enhanced EPDs
crossbreeding
hybrid vigor
heterosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beef cow-calf veterinarians are relied upon more and more to provide advice and consulting to their clients. While issues of health are the mainstay of many conversations, progressive producers are asking their herd health veterinarians about non-health subjects that have a financial impact on their herds. Providing unbiased information on improving the genetics of a herd can make a significant impact on the producerâ€™s bottom line.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2020 Recent Graduate Proceedings; 65-69
